<NEW>

Wheelie glanced up at the sky, "The more things cha=
nge, the more they stay the same.  Look at us, here on the range.  Look at =
what we were, in the heavens where we occur.  The AUtobots, the Decepticons=
. Now the Maximals and the Predacons.  What we were, now are they.  The war=
 carried on aother way.  In the ages to come, in the ages to pass, will som=
eday they be the ancients watching as their descendents carry the ballast?"=


Looking up to the heavens, "Is that what we are?  Always at war?  Can we =
bedevil no other fates but what shall occur?"  Pausing, "The roads, the sky=
lanes, all to war.  In the past, in hte future.  Can we never ever find a w=
ay to suture?  I see what we were, I see what we are.  I see nothing but de=
struction from star to star.  It makes me sad, it makes me mope, for being =
here I see we have no hope.  For even if we do win..  We shall begin the cy=
cle yet again.  Even if we protect the past, the future shall have war, it =
will always last."
